productDescription: Arya has one large compartment for your 15.5 ”laptop. In addition, two compartments and a zip pocket for your notes, your lunch and much more. At the front, under the flap, you will find a zipper and an extra compartment so that you can easily access your keys and wallet. You can put your phone in one of the two side pockets.

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
- B28 x H40 x D13 cm
- Adjustable padded shoulder straps; min 27cm, max 35cm
- 15 ”laptops and A4 documents fit in there
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
